+ Keyboard Shortcut Ctrl-H

Use [Ctrl-H] in order to view the [history] of the WikiPages you have visited.

++ See also

	* [Ctrl-Alt-Left], [Ctrl-Alt-Right], [Ctrl-Alt-Up], [Ctrl-Alt-Down].
